rukus.text: Sapatha phajarera
sapatha dasa ratrira, sapatha tara
ya jora o ya bijora
ebam sapatha ratrira yakhana ta gata hate thake
era madhye ache sapatha jnani byaktira jan'ye.
Apani ki laksya karenani, apanara palanakarta ada bansera irama gotrera sathe ki acarana karechilena
yadera daihika gathana stambha o khumtira n'yaya dirgha chila ebam
yadera samana sakti o balabirye sara bisbera saharasamuhe kona loka srjita hayani
ebam samuda gotrera sathe, yara upatyakaya pathara kete grha nirmana karechila.
Ebam bahu kilakera adhipati phera'unera sathe
yara dese simalanghana karechila.
Atahpara sekhane bistara asanti srsti karechila.
Atahpara apanara palanakarta taderake sastira kasaghata karalena.
Niscaya apanara palakarta satarka drsti rakhena.
Manusa erupa ye, yakhana tara palanakarta take pariksa karena, atahpara sam'mana o anugraha dana karena, takhana bale, amara palanakarta amake sam'mana dana karechena.
Ebam yakhana take pariksa karena, atahpara riyika sankucita kare dena, takhana baleh amara palanakarta amake heya karechena.
Eta amulaka, baram tomara etimake sam'mana kara na.
Ebam misakinake annadane parasparake utsahita kara na.
Ebam tomara mrtera tyajya sampatti sampurnarupe kuksigata kare phela
ebam tomara dhana-sampadake pranabhare bhalabasa.
Eta anucita. Yakhana prthibi curna-bicurna habe
ebam apanara palanakarta o pheresatagana saribad'dhabhabe upasthita habena
ebam sedina jahannamake ana habe, sedina manusa smarana karabe, kintu e'i smarana tara ki kaje asabe
se balabeh haya, e jibanera jan'ye ami yadi kichu agre prerana karatama
sedina tara sastira mata sasti ke'u dibe na.
Ebam tara bandhanera mata bandhana ke'u dibe na.
He prasanta mana
tumi tomara palanakartara nikata phire ya'o santusta o santosabhajana haye.
Atahpara amara bandadera antarbhukta haye ya'o.
Ebam amara jannate prabesa kara.
